attributes.action: reconsider insurance,  muzzling, microchipping of ALL UK dogs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government proposals suggest forcing every dog owner to take out third party insurance per dog, and to have their dog microchipped (which can be problematic in very tiny breeds and in many cases is better of done only under an anesthetic). This may lead to mass destruction of unwanted dogs, and hardship for many decent responsible dog owners.
